casebody.data:
David R. SCOGGIN, Appellant-Respondent,
v.
Melony SCOGGIN-SOMMERS, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 31A05-1608-DR-2006 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed November 17, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

PYLE , J.

Affirmed in part, reversed in part, and remanded.

BAKER, J., Concurs.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.
